caption.p: Transmission parameters converge to stable distributions before the end of the burn-in period. The value accepted at each of the first 2000 iterations of the MCMC random walk for (a, e) k 11 , (b, f) k 21 , (c,g) k 12 , and (d, h) k 22 in (a–d) Ngorongoro and (e–h) Serengeti.
